Tuna Casserole

Ingredients

  • 2 cans tuna
  • 1 can peas
  • 1 can cream of mushroom soup
  • 1 pkg noodles ???
  • salt
  • pepper
  • milk

Instructions

  1. Cook noodles and drain
  2. Butter 13x9 dish
  3. Layer tuna, peas, soup, noodles
  4. Pour milk around the edges (???)
  5. Bake at 350F for 35-45 mins
